pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau Speaks to the President of the United States, Donald Trump | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, spoke with the President of the United States, Donald J. Trump.

The leaders discussed the North American Free Trade Agreement including bringing the negotiations to a timely conclusion.

The Prime Minister also raised strong concerns about the U.S.â€™s Section 232 investigation on automobile imports, given the mutually beneficial integration of the Canadian and American auto industries.
